sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const botTypeClasses = { Assault: "icon military", Defender: "icon shield", Support: "icon plus circle", Medic: "icon ambulance", Witch: "icon magic", Captain: "icon star", }; function BotCard({ bot, botFunction }) { return (
botFunction(bot)}>
{bot.name}
{bot.catchphrase}
{bot.health} {bot.damage} {bot.armor}
); } export default BotCard;
